info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 10:20PM EDT until June 11 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...EASTERN COLUMBIANA...WESTERN BEAVER... SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 1020 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Waterford to near Wellsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... East Liverpool, Columbiana, East Palestine, Wellsville, Calcutta, Ohioville, Midland, Chester, Industry, New Waterford, New Cumberland, and Shippingport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
